types.description: Check if there's update available. How check is performed depends on current update module implementation. Outputs update file version and its size.

in_ports.description: Start a check on current URL to see if update is available.
in_ports.name: CHECK

in_ports.description: Cancel an ongoing check operation. No output packets shall be sent, unless a new CHECK is issued
in_ports.name: CANCEL

in_ports.description: Causes task current progress to be sent to PROGRESS port
in_ports.name: GET_PROGRESS

types.name: update/check

out_ports.description: Current progress of task, a number between 0 and 100. An output of -1 indicates that current progress is not available
out_ports.name: PROGRESS

out_ports.description: If update version is different from current version, outputs true, false otherwise. Note that this behaviour is backend defined: if an update module also downgrades, it may output true here also.
out_ports.name: NEED_UPDATE

types.description: Fetch an update. If eveything goes well, it should output true on port SUCCESS.

in_ports.description: Cancel an ongoing fetch operation. No output packets shall be sent, unless a new FETCH is issued
in_ports.name: CANCEL

in_ports.description: Causes task current progress to be sent to PROGRESS port
in_ports.name: GET_PROGRESS

types.name: update/fetch

out_ports.description: Current progress of task, a number between 0 and 100. An output of -1 indicates that current progress is not available
out_ports.name: PROGRESS

types.description: Install update. Process of installing update depends on current underlying update module.

in_ports.description: Cancel an ongoing install operation. Note that this is dependent on current underlying update module and may not be possible.
in_ports.name: CANCEL

in_ports.description: Causes task current progress to be sent to PROGRESS port
in_ports.name: GET_PROGRESS

types.name: update/install

out_ports.description: If install completed successfuly, sends true, false otherwise. Note that errors packet may be sent in case of failure
out_ports.name: SUCCESS

out_ports.description: Current progress of task, a number between 0 and 100. An output of -1 indicates that current progress is not available
out_ports.name: PROGRESS
